sentences.en: Arbor seeding occupies only 0.216 % , shrub 0.212 % and liane 1.046 %.
sentences.cn: 等优势种所构成的草本植物(98.527%)为主,乔木幼苗个体比例在调查中只占到0.216%, 灌木、藤本分别占0.212%和1.046%.

sentences.en: Chilean shrub bearing coral - red fruit with an edible seed resembling a hazelnut.
sentences.cn: 智利灌木,有珊瑚红的果实,有象榛实的可食用的种子.

sentences.en: Deciduous shrub style such as lilac, spirea, hydrangea, etc.
sentences.cn: 落叶灌木类,如丁香 、 绣线菊 、 绣球花等.

sentences.en: Every tree and shrub seems to be in bloom.
sentences.cn: 几乎每棵乔木和灌木都在盛开花朵.

sentences.en: Flee , save your life, And be like a shrub in the wilderness.
sentences.cn: 6你们要奔逃,自救性命, 要像旷野的灌木.

sentences.en: I'm starting to think Rodney James a better deal as the Shrub.
sentences.cn: 我开始觉得还是像罗德尼.詹姆斯扮演矮灌木比较爽.

sentences.en: In fact the shrub had barely been cut back at all.
sentences.cn: 实际上,灌木丛几乎根本就没修剪过.

sentences.en: Moving a shrub is best done in early spring.
sentences.cn: 移植灌木最好是在初春的时候.

sentences.en: Rose, a red rose for the deciduous shrub rose family.
sentences.cn: 玫瑰, 红的玫瑰为落叶灌木蔷薇科.

sentences.en: South African shrub grown for its profusion of white flowers.
sentences.cn: 南非的灌木,由于其丰富的白花而被种植.

sentences.en: South African tree or shrub having a rounded crown.
Species richness was generally low in all shrub communities.
sentences.cn: 各类灌丛之间物种丰富度指数相差不大.

sentences.en: The fancy types into tree, small tree and shrub.
sentences.cn: 观赏类型分为乔木 、 小乔木和灌木.

sentences.en: There are only road, trees, shrub and farmland out of the ICF.
sentences.cn: 外面除了道路就是树木 、 灌丛和农田.

sentences.en: There is a small evergreen shrub on the hillside.
sentences.cn: 山腰上有一小块常绿灌木丛.

words.tran_cn: 灌木的；灌木繁茂的；灌木一般的

trans.tran_cn: 灌木，灌木丛，果汁甜酒，冰果汁水
trans.tran_en: a small bush with several woody stems
